sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.BaseNotifyJsTelephonyDriver</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>BaseNotifyJsTelephonyDriver</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BaseNotifyJsTelephonyDriver = Class.create();
BaseNotifyJsTelephonyDriver.prototype = {
	CAPABILITIES: {
		SHOW_SPEAKERS: 'show_speakers'
	},

	initialize: function () {
		var type = this.type;
		this.logger = {
			error: function () {
				var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
				args[0] = type + args[0];
				gs.error.apply(gs, args);
			},
			warn: function () {
				var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
				args[0] = type + args[0];
				gs.warn.apply(gs, args);
			},
			info: function () {
				var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
				args[0] = type + args[0];
				gs.info.apply(gs, args);
			}
		};
	},

	getName: function () {
		return this.type;
	},

	type: 'BaseNotifyJsTelephonyDriver'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-06-29 19:48:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>428c823487031300b18a046787cb0bf0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>BaseNotifyJsTelephonyDriver</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notify" source="com.snc.notify">b567f9452f140110d8a4d5f62799b6e4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_428c823487031300b18a046787cb0bf0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-11-02 06:49:34</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>741</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
